Blackstorm:

"I don't need that you or anyone else care me"said annoyed the 
femme "I can care myself... and I will prove you"

She move quickly towards mess hall




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Alright... I got absolutely zero questions about Aerotaur's 
new name... 
> So... here it is.  I got bored and thought he should have a more 
appropriate 
> name for his new look... In short Hevngjerrig is Norwegian for 
Vengeful.  On 
> a side note Hevn is Norwegian for Revenge.
> 
> ::Hevngjerrig::
>        He continues to hold onto Blackstorm's shoulder.  "I'm 
afraid that 
> isn't good enough.  You are the reason I am here.  I exist only to 
ensure 
> your well-being."  He gives her shoulder a quick squeeze and lets 
go, turning 
> to face Maxima again.
> 
>        "As for you, I really don't care what Hydras thinks of my 
new look.  I 
> don't think we're that similar.  I mean come on, he's a two headed 
dragon, 
> and I'm a winged centaur.  How much more different can you get?"  
He leans 
> close to her and smiles amicably.  "As for this form,"  he 
shrugs, "is it my 
> fault if we have similar tastes?"  He winks conspiratorially and 
backs up a 
> step.
